SELECT um.*, ul.name as level_name FROM ums_member um LEFT JOIN ums_member_level ul ON um.member_level_id = ul.id
WHERE um.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR um.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR um.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY um.id

SELECT um.*, ul.name as level_name, ua.id as address_id, ua.member_id as address_member_id, ua.name, ua.phone_number, ua.default_status, ua.post_code, ua.province, ua.city, ua.region, ua.detail_address FROM ums_member um LEFT JOIN ums_member_level ul ON um.member_level_id = ul.id LEFT JOIN ums_member_receive_address ua ON um.id = ua.member_id WHERE um.id = #{id}

SELECT um.id, um.nickname, um.phone, IFNULL(SUM(o.pay_amount), 0) as totalAmount, MAX(o.create_time) as lastOrderTime, COUNT(CASE WHEN o.status = 3 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) as completedOrderCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN o.status = 4 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) as returnOrderCount, um.integration FROM ums_member um LEFT JOIN oms_order o ON um.id = o.member_id
WHERE um.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR um.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR um.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
GROUP BY um.id, um.nickname, um.phone, um.integration
